paper_abstract: In this paper a new algorithm of trajectory tracking based on closest radius solution of the interval equations system is proposed. The design procedure is given and applied to the pitch angle control of unmanned testing rocket with uncertain parameters. The proposed algorithm gives a framework to design a control for a wide range of different linear time-invariant processes with uncertain parameters and can be implemented also in the case of non-convex problems. The algorithm gives the analytical way of finding the nearly optimal solution of model reference trajectory tracking in the case of general time-invariant systems with uncertain parameters and can be used when optimization method fails due to the complexity of the problem.
paper_title: Pitch angle control of unmanned air vehicle with uncertain system parameters
